title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Grand Junction, Colorado
content:
Photo submitted by Amber Hoadley, “This is a classic view of sunrise on the Colorado Monument. Summer in Grand Junction is hot, so road riding at 6:00 am is a must. I shot this with a 35mm film camera that fits in my jersey pocket. Worth waking up for this view!” We always love seeing […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Grand Junction, Colorado appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
